DOC.criteria: Healthy male female age 18 70 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m^2 , inclusive Females could pregnant breast feed use birth control Positive drug screen substance abuse Positive result HIV , hepatitis B , hepatitis C Screening 12lead ECG demonstrate QTc interval > 430 msec male > 450 msec female , cardiac rhythm disorder consider Investigator clinically relevant
